name: Int.toAdd_pow
initialProofState:
a : Multiplicative Int
b : Nat
⊢ Eq (Multiplicative.toAdd (HPow.hPow a b)) (HMul.hMul (Multiplicative.toAdd a) ↑b)
decl: lemma toAdd_pow (a : Multiplicative ℤ) (b : ℕ) : (a ^ b).toAdd = a.toAdd * b := mul_comm _ _

name: Int.toAdd_zpow
initialProofState:
a : Multiplicative Int
b : Int
⊢ Eq (Multiplicative.toAdd (HPow.hPow a b)) (HMul.hMul (Multiplicative.toAdd a) b)
decl: lemma toAdd_zpow (a : Multiplicative ℤ) (b : ℤ) : (a ^ b).toAdd = a.toAdd * b := mul_comm _ _

name: Int.ofAdd_mul
initialProofState:
a b : Int
⊢ Eq (Multiplicative.ofAdd (HMul.hMul a b)) (HPow.hPow (Multiplicative.ofAdd a) b)
decl: @[simp] lemma ofAdd_mul (a b : ℤ) : ofAdd (a * b) = ofAdd a ^ b := (toAdd_zpow ..).symm
